text: Carl Ebert (born 3 February 1889, date of death unknown) was a German field hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:Year of death missing Category:German male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Germany Category:Field hockey players at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Carl Ebert (field hockey)
